title: Lord of the bush
brief_description: Lord Alistair McAlpine, entrepreneur and Treasurer of Margaret Thatcher’s Conservative Party is opening Broome for Tourism. Examines the issues that have been raised including Aboriginal land rights and the conflict between tourist developments and conservation. Interviews colourful Broome identities and their reactions to the changes.
